fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Taxation, Single market, Banking and financial services
eu_initiatives: PRIIPS, MIFID2, IDD2, AEOFI, AIFMD, UCITS IV, Mortgage, Pension PEPPP
organisation_name: Fédération Européenne des Conseils et Intermédiaires Financiers (FECIF)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: One annual event - Quaterly review Trusting - Monthly on-line newsletter
goals__remit:
FECIF has been set up in 1999 to represent and defend the interest of financial intermediaries in Europe. 
Today FECIF represents more than 250,000 financial intermediaries (insurance & investment agents, brokers and consultants) across Europe.
